subject: Order #SSN2989
description_text:
Hi,

I recently made the above order and some of it has so far arrived.
I have received the pedals on Saturday and I can see from my emails that the haptics are on the way to me too. However I don't see anything to mention the baseplate that should have come with the pedals. Is this in another shipment or was this missed during shipping?

Regards,
Eamonn Tully

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Eamonn Tully,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Due to a stock shortage of the Pro X Ultra baseplate at our German warehouse, we will ship your order once we restock within the next two days.

That's great, thanks for the quick response and service!

Regards,
Eamonn
________________________________

Hi,

I'd just like to check in on this, is there any tracking number so I can make sure I am home when it is due to be delivered?

Regards,
Eamonn Tully
________________________________
Hi Eamonn Tully,    Your package is expected to be delivered to you on the 11th.  https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=CE326630470DE
